description: WCS Collective Dance from 7:45–9:45pm at Eastern Star Hall on a medium/hardwood dance floor. Admission is $7; free for those currently registered in a wcs class.
Dance City Ballroom Dance at Victoria Edelweiss Club featuring a Cha Cha workshop with John at 7:30pm and a dance segment from 8:30–10:30pm on a large hardwood dance floor.
WCS Collective Dance at Dance Victoria featuring a workshop at 7:00pm and a dance segment from 8:00–10:00pm on a medium/hardwood floor. Admission is $12.
WCS Collective Dance from 7:45–9:45pm at Eastern Star Hall. Admission is $7; free for those currently registered in a wcs class.
Dance City Salsa Dance at Victoria Edelweiss Club featuring a workshop 'Salsa with Christina' at 8:00pm and a dance segment from 8:45pm to midnight on a large hardwood dance floor.
Commodores Big Band 50th Anniversary Show featuring performances by Salsa Caliente and by John & Christine. SOLD OUT.
